Ok, confession: I don't know how to draw 2d art. I'm learning that specific skill in the old fancy way, but it's difficult and I'm terrible.


But internet is wonderful, and lots of artists share their works for free. Those arts usually are created for a game building software called "RPG Maker", but, well, I used them for my web :)


Below you can find the links of this artists:

Sithjester's RMXP Resources


An excellent page of sprites. My "Ludo" character was born in there (I made a Frankentein with body parts, glasses and clothes)


Kyle dove city sprites


Awesome artist, and a great inspiration for mapping


Mr Jesus DC & Marvel sprites


Venom, Superman, Batman. Great!

Dalek and Doctor who sprites
